title: Can't loggon! Loggin issue
body:
I have some troubles to cxonnect to pvp.net. EUNE sever.

fails tracert to 31.186.224.52 = 9 hop
to 95.172.70.182 = 10-11
I play from russia.. Adn to RU server eeasy to connect.. pLZ HELP ME!

replies.body: Please reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)whenever best for you.  They will be able to review your [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) and help find the best option for you.  Best of luck!
Thank u! Try to do that!
